Package org.idmunit.connector

Interface Summary
Connection Provides the basic interface for an IdMUnit Connector implementation.
 

Class Summary
ConnectionConfigData Holds credential data for the target system
DTF Implements an IdMUnit connector for Delimited Text File drivers
ISeries Implements an IdMUnit connector for DB2 (JDBC) running on an ISeries AS400
LDAP Implements an IdMUnit connector for LDAP directories.
Oracle Implements an IdMUnit connector for Oracle
